Name: Arteris Inc
Description: Arteris Inc. (AIP) is a prominent player in the semiconductor industry, specializing in interconnect IP solutions essential for system-on-chip (SoC) design. Catering to a diverse client base, Arteris enhances communication between chips, enabling superior data processing capabilities critical for modern electronic devices. With a comprehensive product portfolio and a strong focus on innovation, the company is well-positioned to capitalize on the increasing complexity and performance demands of advanced chip architectures. Its strategic alliances further strengthen its market presence, underpinning Arteris's potential for sustained growth in the dynamic semiconductor landscape.
Address: 900 E. HAMILTON AVENUE, CAMPBELL, CA, UNITED STATES, 95008
